'''威尔斯纪念大楼'''（Wills Memorial Building），又名'''威尔斯纪念塔'''，简称'''威尔斯塔'''，是[[英国|英国]][[布里斯托尔|布里斯托尔]]的一座[[新哥特式|新哥特式]]建筑，由乔治·奥特利爵士设计，纪念亨利·奥弗顿·威尔斯三世<ref name=autogenerated2>[http://www.bris.ac.uk/university/gallery/places/wmb.html Bristol University | The University | The Wills Memorial Building] {{webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20071010052251/http://www.bris.ac.uk/university/gallery/places/wmb.html |date=2007-10-10 }}</ref><ref name=autogenerated1>http://www.about-bristol.co.uk/lnd-03.asp</ref><ref>[http://www.skyscrapernews.com/buildings.php?id=686 Building - 686 - Wills Memorial Tower - Bristol]</ref><ref name="BristolUniversityNews">{{cite web |url=http://www.bristol.ac.uk/news/2006/875.html|title=Bristol University|work=Wills Tower set for new glory
|accessdate=2007-06-23}}</ref>。它开工于1915年，直到1925年才建成开放，被认为是英国最后一座伟大的哥特式建筑<ref name=autogenerated3 />。

威尔斯纪念大楼靠近皇后路公园街顶部<ref name=autogenerated3>[http://www.bristol-link.co.uk/history/wills-memorial-building.htm The Wills Memorial Building is situated at the top of Park Street in Queens Road]</ref>，是[[布里斯托尔大学|布里斯托尔大学]]的地标建筑，目前是法学院、地球科学系，以及法律与地球科学图书馆的所在地<ref>[http://www.bristol.ac.uk/university/gallery/places/law-library.html Bristol University | The University | Law Library] {{webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20070927234111/http://www.bristol.ac.uk/university/gallery/places/law-library.html |date=2007-09-27 }}</ref>。它是布里斯托尔的第三高楼，高68米（215英尺）<ref>http://www.emporis.com/application/?lng=3&nav=building&id=151240</ref>。

许多人都将这座建筑当做是布里斯托尔大学的同义词。它是该校的核心建筑<ref name=autogenerated4>[http://www.bris.ac.uk/romanticstudies/events/willsbuilding.html Bristol University - Centre for Romantic Studies - Wills Memorial Building] {{webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20060627041332/http://www.bris.ac.uk/romanticstudies/events/willsbuilding.html |date=2006-06-27 }}</ref>，学位仪式就在大厅举行<ref>[http://www.bristol.ac.uk/university/gallery/people/degree.html Bristol University | The University | Graduation] {{webarchive|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20070519045252/http://www.bristol.ac.uk/university/gallery/people/degree.html |date=2007-05-19 }}</ref> 。

威尔斯纪念大楼被列为英国二级登录建筑<ref>{{cite web | title=University Tower and Wills Memorial Building and attached front walls and lamps | work=Images of England | url=http://www.imagesofengland.org.uk/details/default.aspx?id=380278 | accessdate=2007-03-13}}</ref>。
